casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Scott BADGETT. No. 522A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2005. John H. Watters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of December 2005 by Defendant for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Badgett) shall have up to and including the 27th day of January 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of December 2005."
